body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping      Â    Restaurants and lodging can be found near every one of Jean Lafitte's six sites, so no food or lodging is available in the park. To find a places to eat and sleep, visit the site pages and look for the link to tourism information at the bottom of each site's page.  Many of Louisiana's state parks offer camping; follow this link to the main state parks page. The tourism links mentioned above can help you find information about privately-run campgrounds.
title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: Eating & Sleeping
